1: rol <error-prone>pa</error-prone> bzung la//sgra yig <error-prone>i</error-prone> ni <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> bar bya//byang las <error-prone>bzhi</error-prone> <error-prone>pa gang</error-prone> yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can gyi stan//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung <error-prone>nas//thig</error-prone> le u yig sbyor bar bya//dbu ma'i gnyis pa
2: gang <error-prone>yin</error-prone> <error-prone>pa//nub</error-prone> kyi <error-prone>dang</error-prone> po 'gyur bar bya//de la a yig <error-prone>med</error-prone> ces pa//bdag gis thams cad du ni bshad//ces bcom ldan 'das dpal <error-prone>rdo</error-prone> rje sems dpas gsungs so//rlung mtshams phyi rol
3: pa bzung nas//me mtshams pa yi stan dang <error-prone>ldan//tsheg</error-prone> drag <error-prone>i</error-prone> <error-prone>yig ldan</error-prone> pa ni//dang po <error-prone>par</error-prone> ni yongs su grags//dbus las dang po bzung <error-prone>ba dang //byang</error-prone> nas dbu ma yang yin la//dbus las tha ma
4: <error-prone>dang sbyor</error-prone> <error-prone>te//sgra</error-prone> yig i dang <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> <error-prone>ba</error-prone> <error-prone>yi//mkhas</error-prone> pas lan <error-prone>gnyis</error-prone> <error-prone>brjod</error-prone> <error-prone>par</error-prone> bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la <error-prone>yang //thig</error-prone> le u yig gis <error-prone>brgyan</error-prone> te//tha mar <error-prone>yi ge</error-prone> <error-prone>a</error-prone> la <error-prone>yang //thig</error-prone> le dang ni ldan par bya//zhes bcom
5: ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rlung mtshams <error-prone>phyi</error-prone> rol pa bzung <error-prone>nas//tsheg</error-prone> drag o yig sbyor bar bya//dbus las dang po bzung ba dang //byang las dbu ma pa la yang //dbus
6: las tha ma dang <error-prone>sbyar</error-prone> te//sgra yig <error-prone>a yis</error-prone> brgyan par bya//dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la//sgra yig <error-prone>i</error-prone> dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma nyid la <error-prone>yang //dbang</error-prone> ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbus las
7: dbu ma dang <error-prone>sbyar</error-prone> te//sgra yig a dang ldan pa ni//rtag par lci bar gyur pa yin//shar las dang po bzung <error-prone>nas</error-prone> ni//me mtshams pa yi <error-prone>gdan</error-prone> dang <error-prone>ldan//dbus</error-prone> las <error-prone>tha</error-prone> ma bzung <error-prone>ba la//sgra</error-prone> yig <error-prone>a</error-prone> dang
8: sbyor bar bya//shar las dang po bzung nas su//me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan//dbus las tha ma pa yang yin//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la//thig le u yig sbyor bar bya//lho nas dbu
